trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_SEQ_00<tab>The amiable maiden appears suddenly concerned.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Tista-Bie.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_01<tab>Win a game against Tista-Bie.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_02<tab>Win another game against Tista-Bie.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Atharn.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_04<tab>/dance on the mark on stage.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Atharn.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Dulia-Chai.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_EMPLOYEE03287_000_000<tab>I will never leave my lady's side again!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_LADY03287_000_010<tab>All this talk of relying on the bonded, and I haven't given a thought as to what your duties might be. I hope I haven't interrupted your work unduly?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_LADY03287_000_011<tab>A tour of the city, is it? Then you really must visit the Beehive─it's always buzzing with activity! Ahem, local humor...

TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_LADY03287_000_012<tab>Anyway, a lady by the name of Tista-Bie usually has her seat near the entrance. She will gladly speak with you on any number of topics, assuming you find yourself on her good side!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_LADY03287_000_020<tab>I think you will find the Beehive is far more diverting than watching me pick out new curtains for the parlor!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_030<tab>Welcome to the Beehive, my little drone. Seeking the sting of excitement to liven up your day?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_031<tab>...Hm hm, I can tell at a glance when folk are new to our happy colony. It's the nervous fluttering, you see─always gives them away.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_032<tab>Why don't we play some cards to set you at your ease, eh? A quick game of “High or Low”─it's simply a matter of guessing who has the bigger hand.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_033<tab>If you win, I'll grant you a single favor...within reason, of course. Interested?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_040<tab>Ready for a game of “High or Low”, then?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_Q1_000_041<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A1_000_042<tab>Let's play!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A1_000_043<tab>Maybe another time.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A1_000_044<tab>What are the rules?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_045<tab>“High or Low” is a guessing game. You must decide whether the total of your three cards is higher or lower than the total of your opponent's cards.

TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_046<tab>The deck holds nine cards, with the pictures printed thereon representing the numbers one through nine. Each number appears only once in the deck, so there are no repeats.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_047<tab>If you guess correctly, then you win the match. If both totals are the same, then another hand is dealt.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_048<tab>Oh? Well, you know where to find me if you want to play a hand or two.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_049<tab>Good for you! No time like the present, I say!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_050<tab>Three cards for you, three cards for me. You flip one of yours over, and I flip two of mine.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_051<tab>Now, what's your call? Will your total be higher or lower than mine?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_Q2_000_052<tab>I call...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A2_000_054<tab>...high!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_055<tab>You're going with “low,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_056<tab>You're going with “high,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_100_056<tab>My cards add up to <var 20 E802 /var>. And you have...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_110_056<tab>...a total of <var 20 E802 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_057<tab>Congratulations, your guess was right!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_058<tab>Hm... Usually I'd concede defeat at this point, but what do you say to a rematch? One more win, then we'll talk about that favor.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_059<tab>Aw... Sorry, honeybee, but this match goes to me.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_060<tab>Shall we play again?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_061<tab>That's what I like to hear. Let me shuffle the deck...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_062<tab>Had enough for now? Fine, fine─I'll be sitting right here should the mood strike you.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_063<tab>Oho, it seems we came out equal. But as lovely a coincidence as that may be, we still need a clear winner...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_070<tab>Another match of “High or Low”? Come now, little honeybee, we all need our diversions.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_071<tab>That's the spirit! Let me sort out the deck...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_072<tab>Well, well, would you look at that. I think you've got a knack for this, newcomer.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_073<tab>Congratulations! Victory is yours...as is the prize I promised.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_074<tab>Oh dear, looks like this match goes to me.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_075<tab>Come whisper in my ear, then, and don't be shy. Tell ol' Tista what she can do for you.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_076<tab>...That's all? How delightfully wholesome. But if knowledge is what you want, then that is what you shall have.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_077<tab>In my humble estimation, the most wondrous thing about this town is how safe we are from the sin eaters.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_078<tab>They say Lord Vauthry was born with the power to command them─which means no Eulmoran need ever raise a weapon in defense of the city.

TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_TISTABIE_000_079<tab>...Was that the kind of thing you wished to know? If your itch still needs scratching, you might get a few words out of Atharn over there. There's naught that merry sot likes more than the sound of his own voice.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_080<tab>Whassat? New to Eulmore, you say?

TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_081<tab>Gahaha! Only just arrived and already you're looking to peel away the layers of mystery. Oh, I'm all for chatting, but you need to slow down and <var 1A 02 /var>enjoy<var 1A 01 /var> life, my friend!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_082<tab>I tell you what: you hop up on stage and give us a dance first, and <var 1A 02 /var>then<var 1A 01 /var> we can have our little talk!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_090<tab>Go on, there's plenty of room up there! Give us your best shimmies and shakes!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_100<tab>(-Atharn-)That's the way! Dance like there's no tomorrow!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_110<tab><whistle> Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was a show! You're welcome to clamber up on stage any time you like!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_111<tab>So...what was it you wanted to ask me? Ah, yes, something about our fair city. Well, I can tell you it wasn't always so peaceful as it is today.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_112<tab>The Eulmoran Army may be the very essence of military might, but even our forces saw grievous losses in the war against the sin eaters.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_113<tab>Things changed for us, oh, around twenty years ago now, when the old ruler's son came to power!

TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_114<tab>He's got this way with the eaters, you see─turns them docile as house cats. I wouldn't be exaggerating to say they've become something of an ally to Eulmore. No longer an enemy to be feared.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ATHARN_000_115<tab>And yet elsewhere, there are still fools who insist on fighting their losing battles... Pah! A toast to Lord Vauthry!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_SYSTEM_000_116<tab>You've gained a preliminary sense of the city. The Chais─and Alphinaud─will be expecting your return.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_120<tab>Hm...? Ah, yes, the assistant. Was there something?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_130<tab>Oh, you've returned from your jaunt around the city? So soon?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_131<tab>You needn't have hurried back─young Alphinaud has yet to put brush to canvas.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_132<tab>One cannot rush good art, I'm told. Or good artists, apparently...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_133<tab>...Ah, finally.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_ALPHINAUD_000_134<tab>I've put together an ensemble out of the garments you chose. Is this satisfactory?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_135<tab>Oh, goodness gracious me! That last outfit was precious, but this makes you look positively dashing!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_136<tab>You truly are a handsome boy! However am I to decide!?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_Q3_000_137<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A3_000_138<tab>What happened to painting?
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_A3_000_139<tab>I don't recall this part of the artistic process...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_140<tab>Exactly! The lad is an artist, dearest, not a dress-up doll. It's about time we set him to work for the reason we called him here!
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_141<tab>...Must we? I do love a good painting, but I thought since we were enjoying ourselves so thoroughly...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_142<tab>Well, I'd not─ That is to say, as long as you...
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_CHAINUZZ_000_143<tab>Ugh. Just...make sure you give the lad time to prepare. We know who'll be upset if he's not ready to paint at a moment's notice.
TEXT_LUCKMA207_03288_DULIACHAI_000_144<tab>Whatever you say, darling. So! Shall we pick out some jewelry, next!?
